name: Planetary Infestation
description:
As evolution has reached its peak on planet Icaria, a giant organism emerges from its core, attempting to take over the solar system on its way to beat the next final frontier.

How to play:

Use  moons in your orbit to destroy the other planets. If you run out of ammo be quick to steal moons from their respective owners  or pick up rubel from dead planets, otherwise you will lose.

Spacebar - Shoots in the direction of your mouse
LMB - Collects nearby moons and asteroids
RMB - Smash moons

C# Programming - Meyham

Sounds - Derf

Pixel art - Kakalambo
